title: Graph of func. def. by integration part - c

content.question: Suppose that f is defined for all real numbers x and is periodic with a period of length 5. The graph above shows two periods of f. Given that g(5) = 2, find g(10) and write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of g at x =108.

frqParts.text: Suppose that f is defined for all real numbers x and is periodic with a period of length 5. The graph above shows two periods of f. Given that g(5) = 2, find g(10) and write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of g at x =108.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
